lines.text: I don't want to be alive. I want out of these clothes. I want out of this body. I want out of this world.
Naturally, I now love Jesus very much. Yes, I love him so damn much that I would like to crucify him all over again!
Hey chicken ass, good day for a hanging, huh?
Come on, you hoosier bastard. I could hang ten men in the time it's taking you to hang one.
